author: jvanzyl
msg: - the jsp service is still non-functional but it's been moved here
and out of the turbine core.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - add a routine to detect whether log4j has been configured or
not. still have to add routines to configure the logging when
fulcrum is running in stand-alone mode.
possibly allow for the specification of a properties file,
or allow the logging to be configured programmtically or look
for a properties file on the classpath. maybe a combination

author: jvanzyl
msg: - classes that were using the Log wrapper are now using a log4j
- the getCategory() method has been left in the service interfaces
for all the services that rely on the BaseServiceBroker for a logging
category. this method will remain in place until the
pattern is employed in all the service code so that arbitrary
granularity WRT to logging will be possible.
